item.title: Resume
item.description: Printable single page version here Education Bachelor of Science - Computer Science, 2018 Ontario Tech University, Oshawa, ON Master of Science - Computer Science, Expected Completion 2020 Ontario Tech University, Oshawa, ON Work Experience Teaching Assistant University of Ontario Institute of Technology (UOIT), Oshawa, ON Sept. 2017 - May 2020 Lead classes of 20-25 junior and senior level undergraduate students on in-class activities Corrected student work and provided feedback for improvement Courses: Mobile Devices - Programing Workshop - System Development and Integration - Web Development - Interactive Media - Compilers Graduate Research Assistant University of Ontario Institute of Technology (UOIT), Oshawa, ON Aug.
